mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room_type ORDER BY room_type_id ASC

SELECT rt.name AS room_type_name, rt.description AS room_type_description, rt.base_occupancy, rt.max_occupancy, rt.base_price, rt.image_path, ra.name AS amenity_name FROM room_type rt LEFT JOIN room_amenity ra ON rt.room_type_id = ra.room_type_id WHERE rt.name = #{roomTypeName} ORDER BY rt.room_type_id, ra.amenity_id;

SELECT r.room_id, rt.name, r.room_number, r.floor, r.status, r.view FROM room r JOIN reservation res ON r.room_id = res.room_id JOIN room_type rt ON rt.room_type_id = r.room_type_id WHERE res.status = #{resStatus} AND DATE(res.check_in) = DATE(#{date});

SELECT r.room_id, rt.name, r.room_number, r.floor, r.status, r.view FROM room r JOIN reservation res ON r.room_id = res.room_id JOIN room_type rt ON rt.room_type_id = r.room_type_id WHERE DATE(res.check_in) = DATE(#{date});
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET status = #{status} WHERE room_number = #{roomNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT * from room_type ORDER BY room_type_id ASC

SELECT rt.name AS room_type_name, ra.name AS amenity_name, ra.description , ra.is_active AS amenity_active FROM room_type rt JOIN room_amenity ra ON rt.room_type_id = ra.room_type_id WHERE rt.name = #{TypeName};
mapper.update: UPDATE room_amenity ra JOIN room_type rt ON ra.room_type_id = rt.room_type_id SET ra.is_active = CASE WHEN ra.is_active = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END WHERE rt.name = #{TypeName} AND ra.name = #{amenity};
